location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 7521/46(S) 'Special distribution of Intelligence Summaries, etc.'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 11; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. A previous foliation sequence, which is also circled, has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: The file contains a list of distributed Intelligence Summaries received from across regions on the Frontiers of India and related correspondence from William Millward (Government Communications Headquarters) and Eion Pelly Donaldson (India Office).The file also includes correspondence regarding: enquiries made by Millward over a suspected recent death in the ruling family of Nepal; and a request from the Secretary of State for India to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, and the Political Agents at Bahrein, Koweit [Kuwait] and Muscat, that additional copies of Intelligence Reports be sent in future

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
